Html:
First off, thank you for this amazing UI framework. I really love it.

However two things that bug me: is there a way to easily remove the logo and replace it with a bold title?

Keep up the great work!

Thanks in advance
-Simon
Just checked in an update where the logo is hidden when no ModernWindow.LogoData is specified. The title feature is still pending.

kozw,
thank you very much; this works for me :)

Best regards
-Simon
